/>
VIII.ii.1.A.1.c
.
Presumptive SC Under 38 U.S.C. 1117
Under current
38 U.S.C. 1117
, there is a presumption of SC for Persian Gulf Veterans with a qualifying chronic disability that became manifest to any degree at any time.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section A - General Information on Presumptive Service Connection (SC) for Persian Gulf Veterans
citation: Part VIII, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section A
